extendedInfo.description: Locale Condition for Docks!Automatically change your settings when your phone is in a car dock or desk (multimedia) dock!Official Dock-plugin was not reliable for me, and this is much nicer looking and easier to use :-)Locale 1.0 RequiredDesigned for android 2.0+ and compatible docks ( Motorola Droid / Nexus One )

reviews.title: Doesn\'t always work
reviews.comment: Sometimes this works exactly as expected, which is great. Other times, it\'s annoying, like right now, when my phone has been out if the dock for 10 minutes, and the volume is still high while I\'m at work, when I want it to be silent.  I wanted to support another developer instead of 244, but this is making my decision regrettable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Application fails to sense my HTC EVO Video Dock, but works well with my HTC Car Dock, the part number for my Video Dock is EVH1357Q.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this plugin! Dev is very responsive.
reviews.author: A Google User
